1@herbs,251,80,6	script	Zona Pet	858,{
	
OnInit:

	setunitdata getnpcid(0), UNPC_GROUP_ID, 1053;	
	setunittitle getnpcid(0), "[Pet Shop]";
	end;
}

1@herbs,251,78,1	script	#petshop	111,{
	
OnInit:
		
	while(1) {
	showscript "[ Loja de Pets ]", getnpcid(0);
	sleep 100;
	}
	end;
}
